list.description:
Click on its name to get more information about a specific command. [Join the support server]({discord}) if you need help.
**[Click here to enable the countdown.]({enable})**
list.title: Commands

description: There is **{hours}** hour left until Christmas!
There are **{hours}** hours left until Christmas!
title: {hours} hour left
{hours} hours left

info.description: The Christmas Countdown bot for Discord by [eartharoid]({eartharoid}) has been running since November 2018. [Learn more.]({about})
info.title: Information

invite.description: [Click here]({url}) to add the Christmas Countdown bot to your own server.
invite.title: Invite

description: There is **{minutes}** minute left until Christmas!
There are **{minutes}** minutes left until Christmas!
title: {minutes} minute left
{minutes} minutes left

description: There is **{months}** month left until Christmas!
There are **{months}** months left until Christmas!
title: {months} month left
{months} months left

radio.description: **[Add the Christmas Radio bot]({url})** to listen to Christmas music in your Discord server.
radio.title: Christmas Radio

description: There is **{seconds}** second left until Christmas!
There are **{seconds}** seconds left until Christmas!
title: {seconds} second left

added.description: {member} has been added to the naughty list.
added.title: ‚úÖ Added

cannot_remove.description: {member} is not on the naughty list.
cannot_remove.title: ‚ùå Can't remove member

removed.description: {member} has been removed from the naughty list.
removed.title: ‚úÖ Removed

no_event.description: There are no secret santa events. Follow [the guide]({url}) to create one.
no_event.title: ‚ùå Error

not_enough_users.description: Sorry, there weren't enough participants. At least 3 members need to join the event for Secret Santas to be assigned.
not_enough_users.title: üò¶ Not enough participants

none.description: You have not entered a Secret Santa event.
none.title: ‚ùå Not assigned

show.description: **You are {member}'s Santa.** Give them a gift, following the event guidelines set by the organiser.
show.title: Secret Santa

channel_created.description: **The widget voice channel has been created.** To disable the widget, delete the channel.
channel_created.title: ‚úÖ Countdown widget created

channel_permissions_error.description:
An error occurred whilst creating the channel.
[Try adding the bot again]({add}).
If it still doesn't work, [ask for help]({support}).
channel_permissions_error.title: ‚ùå Can't create channel

missing_permission:channel.description: The bot does not have permission to manage channels.
missing_permission:channel.title: ‚ùå Can't create channel

missing_permission:view.description: Please ensure the bot has permission to view the channel.
missing_permission:view.title: ‚ùå Can't create webhook

missing_permission:webhook.description: The bot does not have permission to manage webhooks.
missing_permission:webhook.title: ‚ùå Can't create webhook

webhook_created.description:
**The countdown has been enabled**; a message will be sent to {channel} every morning between 5AM and 6AM.

To disable it, use {toggle}.
webhook_created.title: ‚úÖ Countdown webhook created

webhook_permissions_error.description:
An error occurred whilst creating the webhook.
[Try adding the bot again]({add}) and make sure it can see the countdown channel.
If it still doesn't work, [ask for help]({support}).
webhook_permissions_error.title: ‚ùå Can't create webhook

sleeps.description: There {sleeps} or {days}[(?)]({url} "What's the difference between days and sleeps?") left until Christmas!
title: {sleeps} sleep left
{sleeps} sleeps left

disable.description:
**Server administrators: use [`/toggle`]({toggle}) to disable the countdown.**
Please consider reviewing the bot [here]({review}).
Thank you for using this bot and enjoy your Christmas! üôÇ
disable.title: üéÑ Merry Christmas
